DOC.brief_title: Fetal Middle Cerebral Artery Doppler Preterm Births Receiving Magnesium Sulfate Neuroprotection
DOC.detailed_description: The study include woman preterm labor gestational age le 32 week . woman randomize receive either magnesium sulfate ( load dose 6 g 20 minute follow maintenance dose 1 g/hour 24 hour ) , placebo form sodium chloride solution 0.9 % 24 hour . Fetal middle cerebral artery Doppler indices [ Peak systolic velocity ( PSV ) , Pulsatility index ( PI ) , resistance index ( RI ) ] record treatment group . Results Doppler index compare group intake magnesium sulfate find middle cerebral artery Doppler fetus explain mechanism behind use magnesium sulfate fetal neuroprotection preterm birth .
